Desc.entry: Aims to give boys and girls aged 8-15 years, from all over the city, the chance to participate in high quality singing workshops involving music of many different styles and cultures. No experience is necessary, just enthusiasm and commitment. The group aims to give public performances and works towards participation in festivals and competitions.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Thurs 4-5 pm (8-11 years), 5-6pm (11-15 years), term-time only
